Robert Smith

Store Graphic Artist

PERSONAL STATEMENT

More than 20 years experience in apparel sportswear design for printing
and production, Also, Reviewing illustrative material, promoting, and
negotiating, Over 2 years experience In managernent with human resource
responsible, such as hiring, firing, and scheduling. Strong background in all
phases of creative designing, production, and problern solving, . Trained in
areas of branding, strong creative coceptual promoting, designing and
advertising.

WORK EXPERIENCE

Store Graphic Artist
ABC Corporation - July 2008 - May 2011

Re sponsibilities:
Prepared illustrations and rough sketches of material, discussing them
with clients and supervisors and making necessary changes.
Marked up, pasted, and assembled final layouts to prepare layouts for
printer.
Used computer software to generate new images, and separations for
production.
Determined size and arrangement of illustrative material and copy, and
selected style and size of type.
Created designs, concepts, and sample layouts based on knowledge of
layout principles and aesthetic design concepts.
Keyed information into computer equipment to create layouts for client
and supervisor.
Reviewed final layouts and suggested improvements as needed,

Graphic Artist
ABC Corporation- 2005 - 2008

Responsibilities:

= Secondary Positions Billing, Shipping, Quoting, and Assistant Press

Production August 20 2012 - Navernber 8 2013 Duties Process or create
new artwork from customers subrnitted order,
Subrnit proof for custorners approval.
* Maintain all pre-press production equipment.
= Create invoices for customers order,
«Assist or complete all shipping orders.
Some experience quoting custorners order requests.
Lald off due to the decrease of business.

Education
Associate of Arts in Visual Arts - (Art Institute of Atlanta)
